20101229212908.000|20101229212910.000|TR0|result, pipes burst and 40,000 people are

20101229213905.000|20101229213907.000|TR0|Matthew Chance is in Moscow, where angry

20101229213918.000|20101229213921.000|TR0|(BEGIN VIDEOTAPE)
20101229213921.000|20101229213923.000|TR0|
20101229213923.000|20101229213925.000|TR0|MATTHEW CHANCE, CNN CORRESPONDENT:  Hey, 
20101229213925.000|20101229213927.000|TR0|Brooke.  With all this snow and ice for 
20101229213927.000|20101229213929.000|TR0|months on end every year, you might think

20101229214635.000|20101229214638.000|TR0|pregnancies.  And I think what the special

20101229214640.000|20101229214642.000|TR0|Pregnant" episodes have done is show that 
20101229214642.000|20101229214644.000|TR0|once there's a pregnancy, every road ahead 
20101229214644.000|20101229214646.000|TR0|is really hard.  Whether you choose to be

20101229214744.000|20101229214746.000|TR0|
20101229214746.000|20101229214748.000|TR0|KRAMER:  Well, we actually did some 
20101229214748.000|20101229214750.000|TR0|research earlier this year about that very 
20101229214750.000|20101229214752.000|TR0|topic, and 82 percent of teens who have 
20101229214752.000|20101229214755.000|TR0|seen the show say that it doesn't 
20101229214755.000|20101229214757.000|TR0|glamorize teen pregnancy.  In fact, they 
20101229214757.000|20101229214759.000|TR0|say that it helps them better understand 
20101229214759.000|20101229214801.000|TR0|the challenges of pregnancy and parenting.
20101229214801.000|20101229214803.000|TR0|
20101229214803.000|20101229214806.000|TR0|And that's really important, because 
20101229214806.000|20101229214808.000|TR0|teenagers, the vast majority of teen girls 
20101229214808.000|20101229214810.000|TR0|who get pregnant -- there are 750,000 
20101229214810.000|20101229214812.000|TR0|girls who got pregnant in the U.S. this 
20101229214812.000|20101229214814.000|TR0|year.  Most of them didn't think it would 
20101229214814.000|20101229214817.000|TR0|happen to them.  So once you start 
20101229214817.000|20101229214819.000|TR0|personalizing these risks and these 
20101229214819.000|20101229214821.000|TR0|consequences, it helps you to make better 
20101229214821.000|20101229214823.000|TR0|decisions to actually prevent pregnancy.
20101229214823.000|20101229214825.000|TR0|
20101229214825.000|20101229214827.000|TR0|BALDWIN:  And this is very, very personal 
20101229214827.000|20101229214830.000|TR0|between Markai and James.
20101229214830.000|20101229214832.000|TR0|
20101229214832.000|20101229214834.000|TR0|And I want to play this clip, because to 
20101229214834.000|20101229214836.000|TR0|your point about the 82 percent who really 
20101229214836.000|20101229214838.000|TR0|said, look, this began, a conversation,

20101229215745.000|20101229215747.000|TR0|impaired to consent.  That is the basis of 
20101229215747.000|20101229215750.000|TR0|these charges.
20101229215750.000|20101229215752.000|TR0|
20101229215752.000|20101229215754.000|TR0|I have to say, Brooke, our viewers know, 
20101229215754.000|20101229215756.000|TR0|you know I was a sex crimes prosecutor and 
20101229215756.000|20101229215758.000|TR0|I've dealt with cases like this.  These 
20101229215758.000|20101229215801.000|TR0|are very difficult cases to prove because 
20101229215801.000|20101229215803.000|TR0|your complaining witness cannot remember 
20101229215803.000|20101229215805.000|TR0|what happened.
20101229215805.000|20101229215807.000|TR0|
20101229215807.000|20101229215809.000|TR0|How does a prosecutor put someone on the 
20101229215809.000|20101229215812.000|TR0|witness stand and that person says, I 
20101229215812.000|20101229215814.000|TR0|don't recall what happened?  And on the 
20101229215814.000|20101229215816.000|TR0|other side, you have the defendants 
20101229215816.000|20101229215818.000|TR0|saying, I recall what happened, she 
20101229215818.000|20101229215820.000|TR0|consented. This is a very difficult cases 
20101229215820.000|20101229215823.000|TR0|for the Bahamian authorities.
20101229215823.000|20101229215825.000|TR0|

20101229215827.000|20101229215829.000|TR0|is there any surveillance video here?

20101229215834.000|20101229215836.000|TR0|Apparently, the video is of the girls 
20101229215836.000|20101229215838.000|TR0|drinking at a lounge at the hotel prior to 
20101229215838.000|20101229215840.000|TR0|the young men approaching them.  And the 
20101229215840.000|20101229215842.000|TR0|video allegedly also shows the young girls

20101229215849.000|20101229215851.000|TR0|big piece of evidence here in this trial,

20101229215853.000|20101229215856.000|TR0|there's going to be some sort of hearing
